accessclaimcodehelp: This is the link we sent them to gain access. If they didn't receive it please send this manually.
addcameradatabaseinfo: Please double check the make and model are entered correctly
adddeviceplan: Add at least one device to display the plan
addinvestigationhelp: Create new investigations via the server menu
addpresethelp: To add a preset, position the camera using PTZ controls, enter a name for the preset and click Add
addserverinfo: To connect your server, install Agent DVR Server on your computer. Access the local UI (usually at http://localhost:8090). Click on the server menu icon and Remote Access. You do not need to install Agent DVR on client computers.
agentrestartplugin: Warning: Agent DVR may restart. Access the plugin by editing the device
agreedata: By checking this box, you confirm you have read our Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. You understand that the personal information you submit through this website may be stored and processed by us and our third party service providers in the U.S. and elsewhere to provide the services you requested and submission of this form indicates your consent to such transfer
aiuploadtest: This will check your AI server is working properly
alertindicator_help: Flash device border when alert detected
alertmonitorhelp: Displays devices if an alert is generated
allowmedia: The browser requires local device permissions to setup direct connections. Please grant permission to a local device. This won't be accessed
apipermissionprompt: By signing in, you are authorizing CLIENT to control your devices
appconnect_help: Enter your password to display a short code for pairing with mobile devices. Set your password in account settings.
appconnect_pair: Use this code to pair your device. This code will expire in a few minutes:
authinstructions: Scan the QR code or enter the key above into your Authenticator app to validate. Enter the PIN code you receive to continue. Use the Google Authenticator app on your mobile
authinstructionsconfigured: Enter the code from the Google Authenticator app
autofilter_help: Filter recordings and photos on selected device
autohide_help: Automatically hide the playback activity graph
autoplayaudio_help: Play audio when the UI loads on live view
autoreconnect_help: Try connecting every minute when connection to Agent DVR is lost (remote)

b.enablenetworkdiscovery: Turn on Network Discovery in Network and Sharing Center and retry.

browserincompatible: Please use a different web browser (we recommend Google Chrome)
cancelinfo: Warning: Please cancel your existing subscription first. Your subscription will still be valid up to it's expiry date:
channel_help: Usually only used by DVRs. Default is 0
claimcodeinfo: To connect your server, install Agent DVR Server on your computer. Go to the local UI and click on the server menu icon and Remote Access. You do not need to install Agent DVR on client computers. If you have a claim code please enter it below (more info) :
clickedit: Click the edit icon to add devices
clientupdate: UI updated - press Ctrl-F5 to reload (on desktop) or Shift Command R on Mac (Chrome or Firefox). On Safari press Command Option R and shift-click Reload
configuration_help: Save this data to a local file to backup your configuration. To load, copy and paste the configuration in
configuration_help2: Upload individual Agent DVR config files
confirm_help: Confirm on actions like delete, upload etc
confirmdeleteaccount: Click OK to delete your account. This is permanent. Any subscription you have will be cancelled
connectaccounthtml:
Connect to your iSpyConnect account for

  • Secured Remote Access
  • HD Playback
  • Cloud Uploads
  • Rich Push Notifications
  • Email Services
  • Permissions
  • Software Updates
  • Virtual Reality
  • RTMP Streaming
  • Alexa, IFTTT and Home Assistant integrations
... and more!
content_help: Allow access to recordings and photos.
controls_help: Record/ Photo etc. Only applies if Read-Only.
controlshelp2: Rearrange or toggle controls. Layout is saved locally so you can have different settings on different devices.
cut_help: Cut a section from an existing recording. Keeps the original file.
devices_help: Click a slot to add or create a new device
devices_selectslot: Choose a slot to display your new device
download_help: Download a zip file containing your configuration
downloads_help: User can download recordings (recordings could contain audio)
editingmodes: Add or edit layouts in server settings
editlayoutaddslot: Add a slot using edit layout
email_help: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
emailblocked: Email to [EMAIL] has been blocked due to [REASON]
enable2fa_help: Require 2 factor authentication to access viewer
enablegamepad_help: Enable gamepad support for PTZ and VR
enablekeys: Enable shortcut keys in UI settings
enablelater: See account menu to enable later
facehelp: Center the person's face in the Camera, enter their name and click OK. You can add multiple photos of the same face to the same name
facehelp4: Enter the person's name and either upload photos from the drive (Current camera directory is [DIR]) or capture their face using the current camera
failedlocal: Could not connect. Is Agent DVR running?
filteralertaihelp: Only show events containing an alert generated with AI
filteralerthelp: Only show events containing an alert
gridmonitorhelp: Displays devices arranged in a grid

help.content:
Please see the following resources for help with Agent DVR:

  • User Guide
  • Reddit Forum (for community support)
  • Contact Us (for customer support - English only).

initialdevice_help: The device that is first selected when displaying this view
invertcontroller_help: Invert mouse/ gamepad controller in VR mode
ipaddress_help: Examples: http://192.168.1.2:80, https://some.dyn.url:8082. Make sure your network camera has a static IP address on your network
keymappinghelp: Click a button and press a key combination to set a shortcut. F11, Ctrl(Q,N,W,T, Tab) cannot be captured before the browser. Key mappings are saved to your server account.
latlng_help: This is used to calculate sunrise and sunset times in the scheduler
latlng_help2: The latitude and longitude of the location
licenserequired: License required. Please purchase a license via the Store and restart the application
licensingfailedmessage: The Unique ID on the licensing page must match the ID in the license. Go to Manage Licenses if you need to move your existing license to a new install. You can delete the existing license and add a new one with the new ID.
logs_help: HTML logs are also available on the local server at /logs.html
make_help: Start typing the camera manufacturer or model and select from available options
minimuminterval_help: Minimum time between alerts in group (s)
mobilenumber_help: Include the international country code and drop the leading 0 of your number, eg 61410123456
modelhelp: Tip: The model can usually be found on the back or under the camera or sometimes on it's web interface
motionindicator_help: Flash device border when motion detected
motionmaphelp: Specify an area to find motion events (requires a tracking or AI detector when recording)
motionmonitorhelp: Displays devices if motion is detected
mustagree: You must agree to the terms to create an account
name: Name
needownserver: You can only add permissions for servers you control
no_subscription: Your remote access license has expired
nolocalice: Something is blocking local connections. Help
notavailableforsubscriptions: Payment method is not available for monthly subscriptions. Use Pre-Pay.
notavailableinapp: This feature is not available within this application. Please use the web portal
onlylocal: This feature is only available on the local UI
ownviews2_help: User can create their own views, floorplans and filters
paymentstip: Tip: Update your account details to add your business information to receipts
permissionshelp: Invites will be sent by email to access your server. The user must click on the link in the email to gain access
planempty: Saving a plan with no devices removes it

plugindata.gain_desc: Adds an equalizer for any audio source
plugindata.live delay_desc: Adds a delay to live video and audio
plugindata.lpr_desc: License Plate Recognition for Agent DVR (Windows Only)

profiles_help: Profiles store which devices are switched on, have alerts enabled and have recording enabled. Configure your devices and edit a profile to save it. Click the tick button to apply a profile
profiles_help2: Profiles store which devices are switched on, have alerts enabled and have recording enabled. Configure your devices and click the save icon to store it. Click the tick button to apply a profile
pushalerts_help: To use push alerts on mobile devices please install the Agent DVR app
quick_help: To create a quick filter use the search tool and click the save button
recordrawhelp: Saves CPU but larger file sizes and no overlays
remoteurl_help: The secure FQDNS address of your server, example: https://my.agent.dvr.server.org:8443
remoteusername_help: Enter the username and password you setup for your local Agent DVR server
removeserverdetail: This will disconnect this server from your account. Click OK to confirm
reolinkwarning: For Reolink cameras we recommend an RTMP://.. option if available
repairdatabase: Problems were found with the database. We can try to fix them. Click OK to restart (may take a while to complete)
richpush: Mobile Apps and Rich Push Notifications
rtmpadd: Add RTMP servers in Server Settings
runprofile_help: Click OK to save the current profile
savefilter_help: To quickly apply a saved filter use the filters button on the viewer
saveprofile: Save the current settings to profile:
saveprofile_warn: Warning: Changing the name of a profile may break external integrations
scannetwork_help: Updates the list of network devices in the add camera wizard
server_count_exceeded: Too many servers connected to this license
serveroutage: Server Outage - Connections may be impacted
signinnotavailable2: If you signed in using a third party (such as Google, Apple or Microsoft), please sign in through a web browser and set a username and password in Account Settings . You can then use these credentials to log in here.
slotsoverlap: Some slots are overlapping. Please move the controls so each has its own space.
subscriptionbeingprocessed: Your account will be automatically upgraded soon.
systemdisarmed: Disarmed. Alerts are inactive. Click the lock to activate
tiprenameserver: Tip: Customise your server name in settings
trial_expired: Your remote access license has expired
tryanotherbrowser: Try another browser or check firewall isn't blocking ports. See server menu (locally) for remote access
unblockremote: Uncheck Block External Access in Server Settings - Local Server
updateavailablehelp: Important: Backup your device configuration using the server menu before updating

v.antispamfailed: Spam check failed. Please reload the web page
v.cannotclaimowncode: Cannot claim your own access code
v.codeclaimednotconnected: Code claimed but server not yet connected. Please ensure Agent is running with a working internet connection or retry in a few minutes.
v.codeexpired: Serial not found or expired (delete serial.txt in Agent/Media directory and try again)
v.entermobile: Please enter your mobile number as you would dial it in your own country
v.failuresendingemail: Could not send email please send manually to sean@ispyconnect.com
v.filelocked: File is Locked. Unlock it first.
v.invalidtimezone: Please enter a valid timezone (number eg -5)
v.ipblocked: Your IP has been blocked (too many failed logins). Try later
v.needsverification: Your account needs to be verified. Please check your email for a verification link
v.passwordcomplex: Password length must be at least 7 and contain a mix of numbers, upper and lower case letters and a special character
v.passwordresetdisabled: Password reset is disabled for this account
v.suspended: Your account has been suspended. Please contact sean@ispyconnect.com for more information
v.usernameshort: Username too short (must be greater than 3 characters)

verify_help: We sent a verification code to your email address. Click the link in the email to complete account setup.
vrappnotsupported: Not Supported. Try with a web browser
warnaddaccess: Add SERVER to Groups to allow access to this server
warningemail: Email alerts have been rate limited
wrongaccount: Sign in with [ACC] to connect this server
